trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.Action%2A> property to determine which event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.Action%2A>발생 한 이벤트를 확인 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler.
trans-unit.target: 그러면 한 이벤트 처리기에서 여러 이벤트 유형을 처리할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> properties to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: 를 사용 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A>하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A>있는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>이벤트가 발생 하는 >for를</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 확인 하려면 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel a tab change in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 탭 변경을 취소할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>로 설정 된 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 새로 만들어진된 인스턴스에의 속성 값은 지정 된 매개 변수 값으로 초기화 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> 에 대 한 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `tabPage` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the tab change by default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>기본적으로에서 탭 변경을 취소 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: 발생 한 이벤트를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> 에 대 한 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> 에 대 한 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
